gyp ERR! configure error 
gyp ERR! stack Error: Python executable "/Users/Lukas/miniconda3/bin/python" is v3.6.0, which is not supported by gyp.
gyp ERR! stack You can pass the --python switch to point to Python >= v2.5.0 & < 3.0.0.
gyp ERR! stack     at PythonFinder.failPythonVersion (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/configure.js:492:19)
gyp ERR! stack     at PythonFinder.<anonymous> (/usr/local/lib/node_modules/npm/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/configure.js:474:14)

gyp ERR! stack     at emitTwo (events.js:125:13)

gyp ERR! stack     at maybeClose (internal/child_process.js:887:16)
gyp ERR! stack     at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:208:5)
